message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It's a unique opportunity that aligns perfectly with your needs and interests. Given its value to you, I propose we discuss a fair price that reflects its true worth while ensuring it remains within your budget considerations. I kindly suggest a price of $12,000 for this exceptional product. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure your complete satisfaction. Let's schedule a time to discuss further and explore how this product can enhance your experience. Looking forward to your positive response.
